title: Redefining Farming in Afghanistan: Climate Change and the Quest for Sustainable Agriculture

tasks.task: Participate in a meeting with local farmers and village elders
subtasks: Arrive at the village of Sardar in the province of Kandahar
Meet with a group of village elders, farmers, and a farmers association
Discuss challenges faced by farmers in Afghanistan (water scarcity, crop issues, soil problems, markets)
Recognize farmers' awareness of the need to adapt agricultural systems to climate change
Inspect a check dam project funded by the World Bank and implemented by FAO
Note the positive reception and open-mindedness of the farmers towards support and assistance

tasks.task: Participate in a meeting with local farmers and village elders to discuss agricultural challenges and adaptation
subtasks: Arrive at the village of Sardar in the province of Kandahar
Join the meeting with a group including village elders, farmers, and a farmers association
Discuss various agricultural challenges (water scarcity, crop issues, soil problems, markets)
Recognize the farmers' awareness of the need to adapt agricultural systems due to climate change
Inspect a check dam project funded by the World Bank and implemented by FAO
Note the farmers' positive attitude towards assistance and support from organizations like FAO

tasks.task: Attend a meeting with local farmers and village elders in the village of Sardar, Kandahar, Afghanistan.
Conduct a field visit to observe agricultural development projects in Sardar, Kandahar.
Participate in the meeting and inspect a check dam in Sardar, Kandahar.
Participate in a meeting with village elders and farmers in Sardar to discuss agricultural challenges and observe a check dam project.
Visit the village of Sardar in Kandahar, Afghanistan, to inspect a check dam and meet with local farmers.
Visit a village in Afghanistan to engage with local farmers and inspect an irrigation project.
subtasks: Locate the village of Sardar in Kandahar province
Attend a meeting with farmers and elders to discuss agricultural challenges
Understand the project's objectives (erosion control, water management, groundwater recharge)
Assess the project's role in enhancing local agriculture
Observe farmers' attitudes towards external assistance and note their readiness to adopt changes

Inspect an agricultural check dam project in Sardar village
Visit a village in Afghanistan to participate in a meeting with local farmers and inspect an agricultural check dam.
